SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ELSE : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER : ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "CompareTestResultsAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_SV_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SV_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
: SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#)
!Baseline XML : SET &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"base-&$RUNID#.XML") : SET &UC4RB_SV_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SV_BASELINE_XML# : PSET &UC4RB_SV_TMPBASEXML# = &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH#
!Creating baseline xml file in the temp dir : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_XML : SET &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SV_CMD#, " -baselineXML &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Test XML : SET &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"test-&$RUNID#.XML") : SET &UC4RB_SV_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SV_TEST_XML# : PSET &UC4RB_SV_TMPTESTXML# = &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH#
!Creating test xml file in the temp dir : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_XML : SET &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SV_XML_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SV_CMD#, " -testXML &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_SV_CMD#
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_SV_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** COMPARE TEST RESULTS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** COMPARE TEST RESULTS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &UC4RB_SV_COMPARE_RESULT# = "" :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_SV_COMPARE_RESULT::=*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &UC4RB_SV_COMPARE_RESULT# = "&VALUE#" : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SV_COMPARE_RESULT#,,"WORKFLOW"
